targets.query: SELECT "confirmed_cumulative" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

select sum(b) / sum(a) * 100 from (select a, b from (select sum(c) as a from (SELECT last("confirmed_cumulative") as c FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" != 'None') GROUP BY "region" order by time desc LIMIT 1) order by time desc), (SELECT "confirmed_cumulative" as b FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) order by time desc) order by time desc;
SELECT "severe_cumulative"  FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/)  AND $timeFilter  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

select 100* mean(a) / mean(b) from (SELECT "severe_cumulative" as a  FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/)  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1), (SELECT ("confirmed_cumulative" - "death_cumulative" - "recovered_cumulative") as b  FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) order by time desc;
select sum(*) from (SELECT last("confirmed_cumulative") FROM "autogen"./^$measurement$/ WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "region")
select sum(*) from (SELECT last("severe_cumulative") FROM "autogen"./^$measurement$/ WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "region")

select 100*mean(severe) / mean(active_cumulative) from (select sum(severe_cumulative) as severe from (select last(severe_cumulative) as severe_cumulative from summary_dpc_ita_region_86400 where $timeFilter group by region)), (select sum(l1) - sum(l2) - sum(l3) as active_cumulative from (select last(confirmed_cumulative) as l1, last(death_cumulative) as l2, last(recovered_cumulative) as l3 from summary_dpc_ita_region_86400 group by region)) order by time desc
SELECT last("tests_cumulative") as c FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/) GROUP BY "region" order by time desc LIMIT 1

panels.description:
Why "High is bad" ? 
We have seen that a decent detection rate is ~10%. An high rate may means that testing is very targeted on symptomatic people. This should come with an high ICU rate.

targets.query: select sum(b) / sum(a) * 100 from (select a, b from (select sum(c) as a from (SELECT last("tests_cumulative") as c FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/) GROUP BY "region" order by time desc LIMIT 1) order by time desc), (SELECT "confirmed_cumulative" as b FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) order by time desc) order by time desc;

panels.title: Detection Rate (High is bad)

targets.query: SELECT "death_cumulative" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT 100*"death_cumulative" / "confirmed_cumulative"  FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
select sum(*) from (SELECT last("tests_cumulative") FROM "autogen"./^$measurement$/ WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "region")
select sum(*) from (SELECT last("death_cumulative") FROM "autogen"./^$measurement$/ WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "region")

select 100*sum(death_cumulative) / sum(confirmed_cumulative) from (SELECT "death_cumulative", "confirmed_cumulative"  FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP by "region" ORDER BY time DESC) order by time desc;
SELECT "confirmed_cumulative" - "death_cumulative" - "recovered_cumulative"  FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/)  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "recovered_cumulative" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/) ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT 100*"recovered_cumulative" / "confirmed_cumulative"  FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/)  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
select sum(l1) - sum(l2) - sum(l3) from (select last(confirmed_cumulative) as l1, last(death_cumulative) as l2, last(recovered_cumulative) as l3 from  "autogen"./^$measurement$/  group by region);
select sum(*) from (SELECT last("recovered_cumulative") FROM "autogen"./^$measurement$/ WHERE ("country" =~ /^$country$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "region")

select 100*sum(recovered_cumulative) / sum(confirmed_cumulative) from (SELECT "recovered_cumulative", "confirmed_cumulative"  FROM /^$measurement$/  GROUP by "region" ORDER BY time DESC) order by time desc;
SELECT mean("tests_diff") FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter AND tests_diff > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval), "region" fill(previous)
SELECT mean("severe_diff") FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "region"
SELECT mean("confirmed_diff") FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter AND "confirmed_diff" > 0 GROUP BY time($__interval), "region" fill(previous)
SELECT last("confirmed_cumulative"), last("death_cumulative") FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "region" fill(linear) limit 1

list.definition: select distinct(country) from (select country, confirmed_cumulative as c from /^$measurement$/) ;
list.label: Country
list.name: country
list.query: select distinct(country) from (select country, confirmed_cumulative as c from /^$measurement$/) ;

list.definition: select distinct(region) from (select region, confirmed_cumulative as c from /^$measurement$/) ;
list.label: region
list.name: region
list.query: select distinct(region) from (select region, confirmed_cumulative as c from /^$measurement$/) ;
